text: (Akave, ivarkalin nilaimai nam munpu kuriyapati) hpir'avnin makkalin nilaimaiyaip polum, avarkalukku munniruntavarkalin nilaimaiyaip polume irukkiratu. (Avarkalum ivarkalaip polave) tankal iraivanin attatcikalaip poyyakkik kontiruntanar. Akave, avarkalutaiya pavankalin karanamaka nam (palavakai vetanaikalaik kontu hpir'avnukku munnirunta) avarkalai alittuvittatutan hpir'avnutaiya makkalaiyum nam mulkatittuvittom. (Ivarkal) anaivarum aniyayakkararkalakave iruntanar
